alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Greer; Harmon (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 4:22PM CDT until May 31 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HARMON...NORTHWESTERN GREER AND SOUTHWESTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 421 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Vinson, moving northeast at 30 mph. Two inch hail was recently reported north of Wellington, Texas. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Erick, Vinson and Madge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
